sql_e2e.question: What is the current inventory level for each product?
sql_e2e.expected_sql:
SELECT
    p.name AS product_name,
    p.sku,
    i.quantity_on_hand,
    i.quantity_on_order,
    i.quantity_reserved,
    t.name AS territory_name
FROM inventory i
JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN territories t ON i.territory_id = t.territory_id
ORDER BY p.name, t.name;
